name: 22_tidal_midi_p5_basic
description: * Download and install [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) if you don't have it already. * On the command line, navigate to the folder that contains all the files for the example. * Do: `npm update` (just once) * Start the server: `node server.js`    - (All node modules are included) * Navigate in a browser to `localhost:8000`
